    buy(int, Buyer) - Method in class StockMarket
    Executes a simulated buy operation, deducting shares from the market and adjusting the buyer's holdings and capital.
    buyButton - Variable in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Button that triggers the simulation of a buy action based on the amount entered.
    Buyer - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Buyer class represents a simulated market participant with decision-making logic based on market trends, trust levels, and activity.
    Buyer(SimulationInput, String, int, StockMarket, double, double) - Constructor for class Buyer
    Constructs a Buyer instance with specified parameters.
    BuyerFactory - Class in Unnamed Package
    Factory class for creating instances of Buyer with customized attributes.
    BuyerFactory(StockMarket) - Constructor for class BuyerFactory
    Constructs a BuyerFactory bound to a specific StockMarket instance.
    buyers - Variable in class BuyerStatsPanel
     
    buyers - Variable in class StockMarket
    List of all buyer instances participating in the market.
    buyerSelector - Variable in class BuyerStatsPanel
     
    buyersStatsWindow - Variable in class ArrowPanel
    Stats panel window showing real-time statistics of buyers.
    BuyerStatsPanel - Class in Unnamed Package
    BuyerStatsPanel is a Swing-based UI panel that displays detailed statistics for individual buyers in a stock market simulation.
    BuyerStatsPanel(List<Buyer>, StockMarket) - Constructor for class BuyerStatsPanel
    Constructs a BuyerStatsPanel for monitoring the performance of buyers in the market.
